short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record Your Computer Screen and Twambit will automatically publish on your page in a link

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This allows you to record your computer screen with video and audio.
Steps
1. click to share
2. it will start recording your screen
3. click Stop Sharing
4. than on your Twambit Page click the new button "upload ScreenCast"
5. after upload is complete your screencast will be available on your Twambit Page as a link to click and view.
